column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Peter Alford'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien describes  the recent dinner in Rotterdam and encloses a copy of the menu and programme
